clarifications: The function takes two parameters: students_grades (a dictionary mapping student names to grades) and passing_grade (the minimum grade to pass).
Return a single flat list containing only the names of students who passed (grade >= passing_grade).
Do NOT return a tuple, dictionary, or include 'wicked'/failing students.
Do NOT include grades in the output - only return the list of student names.
The return type should be List[str], not Dict or Tuple.
notes: The simulated user explicitly requested a different return format (tuple/dict with both groups and grades) which directly contradicts the hidden expected behavior (simple list of passing names only). This fix clarifies the actual expected return format.
